path.description: Path to the file to edit (required for SEARCH/REPLACE format)

changes.description:
SEARCH/REPLACE blocks in format: <<<<<<< SEARCH
[EXACT text from file - copy from READ tool output]
=======
[replacement text]
>>>>>>> REPLACE. CRITICAL: SEARCH text must match file EXACTLY (character-for-character, including all spaces/tabs/newlines). Always READ the file first and copy exact text. Pre-validation checks all blocks before applying any - if one fails, NO changes are applied. Never paraphrase or retype - copy exact text from READ output. For new files, use empty SEARCH blocks.
